name: World Easter Fight
description:
Warning: For the game to work, each player must be connected to Steam and the Steam app must be running.

World Easter Fight is a "fighting game" where a chicken and a rabbit will face each other in a wrestling match without any mercy. 

The game is inspired by the gameplay of Rock paper scissors, but is more complex. 

Indeed you have to draw shapes on a grid, there are several types of drawings to attack your opponent, defend yourself and heal your wounds, use them wisely to win the game

Credits
  • Game Design : Gaëtan GALATI & Gaëtan PIOU
  • Programming : Gaëtan GALATI, Gaëtan PIOU & Romain SCHLOTTER
  • Art : Gaëtan GALATI
